T02D1218:1b-1: shr'i he badzra s'a dha nam /
T02D1218:1b-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs /
T02D1218:1b-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1218:1b-5: dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1218:1b-6: bdag med ma la gus [dd] phyag 'tshal //
T02D1218:1b-7: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis //
T02D1218:1b-8: de yi sgrub thabs cho ga bshad /
T02D1218:1b-9: dang po kho nar rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1218:1b-10: sems can thams cad kyi don du blo bskyed nas /
T02D1218:1b-11: bla ma bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bsnyen te /
T02D1218:1b-12: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du dpal dgyes pa'i
T02D1218:1b-13: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs shing rim pa ji
T02D1218:1b-14: lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur te /
T02D1218:1b-15: yang dag par rjes su gnang ba shin tu rnam
T02D1218:1b-16: par dag pa'i de kho na nyid ma nor ba'i
T02D1218:1b-17: ye shes thob cing mtshan ma rnyed pa dang /
T02D1218:1b-18: bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa'i dam tshig bsten pa /
T02D1218:1b-19: dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje bsgrub par 'dod pas rig
T02D1218:1b-20: ma dang lhan cig dur khrod la sogs pa yid
T02D1218:1b-21: du 'ong ba'i gnas su 'dug nas mchod pa dang
T02D1218:1b-22: / gtor ma la sogs pa byas te /
T02D1218:1b-23: rang gi snying gar ram las byung ba'i nyi ma la h'u% yig sngon po bltas te /
T02D1218:1b-24: h'u% yig de las 'od zer rnam pa lnga nam mkha'i phyogs su yongs su spros nas /
T02D1218:2a-0: 'od zer des bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las byung ba'i @2a * //
T02D1218:2a-1: sku mdog sngon po phyag dang phyag mtshan 'og nas 'byung ba bzhin du phyag bcu drug pa'am /
T02D1218:2a-4: phyag gnyis pa yang rung ste //
T02D1218:2a-5: rang gi rig ma la 'khyud pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba ;
T02D1218:2a-6: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa /
T02D1218:2a-7: lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D1218:2a-8: sku rnams spro ba dang sdud pa mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su bkug ste bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:2a-9: de'i mdun na goo r'i nag mo phyag na byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba can no //
T02D1218:2a-10: lho phyogs su chom rkun ma btsod kyi mdog can
T02D1218:2a-11: phyag na rang byung gi nyi ma zhes bya ba'i
T02D1218:2a-13: rgyab tu ro langs ma ser mo rdo rje'i chu snod can no //
T02D1218:2a-14: byang phyogs su za phod ma ma ra ka ta lta bu gsang ba'i sman bsnams pa'o //
T02D1218:2a-15: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni spos mo mdog sngon mo sna tshogs pa'i sha bsnams pa'o //
T02D1218:2a-16: me'i mtshams su dur khrod ma dkar mo phyag na ro bsnams pa'o //
T02D1218:2a-17: srin po'i mtshams su gtum mo dmar skya rde'u chung gi sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02D1218:2a-18: rlung lha'i mtshams su sme ma sna tshogs kyi mdog rang gi sku la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1218:2a-19: de ltar bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku rnam par
T02D1218:2a-20: 'phro ba dang sdud pa nam mkha' la bltas nas
T02D1218:2a-21: / rang gi snying gar nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D1218:2a-22: sa bon las 'od 'phros pa'i phyi nang gsang ba
T02D1218:2b-0: / dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag @2b par mchod nas /
T02D1218:2b-1: de'i spyan sngar sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-2: ji srid thog mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba phyin ci
T02D1218:2b-3: log gi rtog pas bsags pa'i sdig pa'i las bdag
T02D1218:2b-4: gis bgyis pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das
T02D1218:2b-5: kyi spyan sngar bshags shing phyis sdom par bgyi'o //
T02D1218:2b-6: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba ji snyed pa
T02D1218:2b-7: thams cad la rjes su yi rang zhing bla na
T02D1218:2b-8: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T02D1218:2b-10: gzhan yang khams gsum thams cad bde ba chen po'i
T02D1218:2b-11: rnam par ro gcig pa'i sangs rgyas dgyes mdzad rdo
T02D1218:2b-12: rje dang / des gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D1218:2b-13: dang dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos dang de'i 'khor
T02D1218:2b-14: lo la 'khor bar gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la
T02D1218:2b-15: bdag skyabs su mchi bar bgyi'o //
T02D1218:2b-16: sems can thams cad kyi don bya ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang /
T02D1218:2b-17: stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid du sems brtan par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-18: de nas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar byams pa chen po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-19: de'i rjes la rnam par rtog pa'i rgya mtshor bying
T02D1218:2b-20: ba'i sems can skyabs med pa rnams mthong nas de
T02D1218:2b-21: dag thams cad bsgral bar 'dod pa'i snying rje chen
T02D1218:2b-22: po'i rang bzhin brtan par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-23: de ltar dga' ba chen po thob pa'i sngags pas
T02D1218:2b-24: brtags pa'i yul rnams la btang snyoms su byas nas
T02D1218:2b-25: / dngos po ma lus pa bsdus pa'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi sngags /
T02D1218:2b-26: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-27: 'di'i rjes la sngags kyi don bdag khams gsum po ngo bo nyid dang bral bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-28: de nas sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pa
T02D1218:2b-29: las nam mkhar ra% las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D1218:2b-30: 'khor gyi dbus su h'u% yig las yang dag par
T02D1218:2b-31: byung ba'i 'od zer lnga'i bdag nyid kyi rtse gsum
T02D1218:2b-32: pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i 'od zer las yang dag
T02D1218:2b-33: par byung ba'i ji snyed 'dod pa'i 'bar ba'i tshogs
T02D1218:2b-34: can gyi rdo rje ra ba blta bar bya'o ;
T02D1218:2b-35: / de'i nang du rdo rje'i dra ba bgegs rnams sel bar byed pa rnam par bsgom mo //
T02D1218:2b-36: de'i dbus su nam mkha' khyab pa'i shes rab ae'i rnam pa lta bu dkar po bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:2b-37: de'i steng du sa'i dkyil 'khor la% las byung ba'i gru bzhi pa ljang gu'o //
T02D1218:3a-0: de'i steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor ba% @3a * //
T02D1218:3a-1: las skyes pa'i zlum po dkar po'o //
T02D1218:3a-2: der me'i dkyil 'khor ra% las skyes pa gru gsum dmar po'o //
T02D1218:3a-3: der rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam las skyes pa'i zla
T02D1218:3a-4: ba phyed kyi rnam pa lta bu mdog sngon po'o
T02D1218:3a-5: // de nas de'i dbus su rnam par shes pa gnas par blta'o //
T02D1218:3a-6: de dag gnas par gyur pa las dkyil 'khor 'khor
T02D1218:3a-7: lo'i khang pa 'od kyi snang ba can skad cig
T02D1218:3a-8: tsam gyis bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1218:3a-9: gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes pa /
T02D1218:3a-10: dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang tva ra
T02D1218:3a-11: na la sogs pas spras pa sems las grub par
T02D1218:3a-13: de'i dbus su zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor
T02D1218:3a-14: bar chud pa'i h'u% dang aam gyi sa bon gnyis
T02D1218:3a-15: las yang dag par byung ba'i gri gug dang thod
T02D1218:3a-16: pa la lte bar lha'i sa bon gnyis kyis mtshan
T02D1218:3a-17: pa blta'o // de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las //
T02D1218:3a-18: bdag nyid dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje'i gzugs sku mdog sngon po zhal brgyad pa /
T02D1218:3a-19: phyag bcu drug pa zhabs bzhi pa bdag med ma
T02D1218:3a-20: dang lhan cig mchog tu dga' ba bde ba chen
T02D1218:3a-22: phan tshun 'khrigs pas chags pa dang ldan par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1218:3a-23: de nas aom padma su kha dha ra ma h'a
T02D1218:3a-24: r'a ga su kham da da tsa tur a'a nanda
T02D1218:3a-25: bha ga bi shva h'u% h'u% h'u% ka ryam ku
T02D1218:3a-26: ru shta me // aom badzra ma h'a dve sha
T02D1218:3a-27: tsa tu ra a'a nanda ya ka kha mu khe
T02D1218:3a-28: ka r'a so n'a tha h'u% h'u% h'u% ka ryam
T02D1218:3a-29: ku ru shva me zhes bya ba 'dis phyi rol
T02D1218:3a-30: gyi chags pa'i bya ba la rdo rje dang padma
T02D1218:3a-32: de nas bsrub cing srubs pa'i sbyor bas lha'i 'khor lo dbyung bar bya ste /
T02D1218:3a-33: de la shar la sogs pa'i sgo ru rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa dang //
T02D1218:3a-37: de bzhin du dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams su
T02D1218:3a-38: ni gshin rje dang nor bdag dang bden bral dang
T02D1218:3a-40: de ltar gdan brgyad po dag bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:3a-41: de'i steng du zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor bar chud pa'i ga% tsa&amp ;
T02D1218:3a-42: ba% gha% ba% sha% la% da% zhes bya ba'i sa bon brgyad kyi bdag nyid blta'o //
T02D1218:3a-43: de dag yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1218:3a-44: dkar mo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma gri gug dang /
T02D1218:3a-51: rdo rje dag bsam par bya'o //
T02D1218:3a-52: de'i steng du yang sa bon brgyad kyi mtshan ma ste /
T02D1218:3a-53: de dag thams cad so sor gcig tu yongs su
T02D1218:3b-0: gyur pa las @3b dkar mo la sogs pa yongs
T02D1218:3b-2: de las shar phyogs kyi sgor ni dkar mo gzugs
T02D1218:3b-3: kyi phung po'i rang bzhin ga% yig las byung ba
T02D1218:3b-4: mdog sngon mo phyag g-yas na gri gug g-yon na
T02D1218:3b-5: ro hi ta'i nya bsnams shing tshangs pa mnan pa
T02D1218:3b-6: dgod par bya'o // lho sgor ni chom rkun ma
T02D1218:3b-7: tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin tsa% yig las yang
T02D1218:3b-8: dag par byung ba btsod kyi mdog can phyag g-yas
T02D1218:3b-9: na rde'u chung g-yon na phag pa bsnams shing dbang
T02D1218:3b-10: po mnan pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1218:3b-11: nub kyi sgo ru ni ro langs ma 'du shes
T02D1218:3b-12: kyi phung po las sgrub cing ba% yig las skyes
T02D1218:3b-13: pa gser bsregs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas na rus
T02D1218:3b-14: sbal g-yon na padma'i snod bsnams shing nye ba'i dbang
T02D1218:3b-15: po mnan pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D1218:3b-16: byang phyogs kyi sgor ni za phod ma 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin /
T02D1218:3b-17: gha% yig las skyes pa ma ra ka ta lta
T02D1218:3b-18: bu phyag g-yas na thod pa bsnams shing drag po
T02D1218:3b-20: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su sbos mo sa'i khams kyi
T02D1218:3b-21: rang bzhin ba% yig las skyes pa mdog sngon mo
T02D1218:3b-22: g-yas na seng ge g-yon na dgra sta bsnams shing
T02D1218:3b-23: ga shin rje mnan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:3b-24: me'i mtshams su ri khrod ma chu'i khams kyi rang
T02D1218:3b-25: bzhin sha% yig las yang dag par byung ba mdog
T02D1218:3b-26: dkar mo phyag g-yas na dge slong g-yon na bsil
T02D1218:3b-27: byed bsnams shing nor bdag mnan pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1218:3b-28: // bden bral gyi mtshams su ni gtum mo me'i
T02D1218:3b-29: khams kyi rang bzhin la% yig las skyes pa nam
T02D1218:3b-30: mkha'i mdog can g-yas na 'khor lo 'dzin pa g-yon
T02D1218:3b-31: na thod pa bsnams shing srin po mnan pa bsgom
T02D1218:3b-32: // par bya'o // rlung gi mtshams su ni sme
T02D1218:3b-33: ma rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin da% yig las
T02D1218:3b-34: yang dag par byung ba sna tshogs kyi mdog can
T02D1218:3b-35: phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa g-yon na sdigs
T02D1218:3b-36: mdzub mdzad cing lha ma yin mnan pa bsgom par
T02D1218:3b-37: // par bya'o // bya'o // de dag thams cad
T02D1218:3b-38: kyang spyan gsum pa mche ba gtsigs pa dbu skra
T02D1218:3b-39: kham pa gyen du 'greng ba gcer bu phyag rgya
T02D1218:3b-40: lnga dang ldan pa phyed krung bcas pa'i gar gyis
T02D1218:3b-41: bzhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'phros pa las yang
T02D1218:3b-42: dag par byung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:3b-43: 'di'i mthar bcom ldan 'das shin tu 'jungs pas mchog
T02D1218:3b-44: tu bde ba chen por ro gcig par ldan pa'i
T02D1218:3b-45: rig ma dang lhan cig tu zhu /
T02D1218:4a-0: @4a * // sa bon gyi gzugs su gnas par gyur to //
T02D1218:4a-1: de la spos mo la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi
T02D1218:4a-2: bdag gi bdag po med par shes nas cher yid
T02D1218:4a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sad par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glus slong bar byed pa ni /
T02D1218:4a-6: snying rje'i yid kyis bcom ldan bzhengs //
T02D1218:4a-7: sbos mo bdag la yongs su skyobs //
T02D1218:4a-8: stong ba'i ting 'dzin spangs nas su //
T02D1218:4a-9: bde chen 'dod pas bdag la sbyor //
T02D1218:4a-10: khyod mi bzhugs pas bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1218:4a-11: stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas su //
T02D1218:4a-12: ri khrod ma dgos bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1218:4a-13: dgyes pa'i rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig /'dod pas 'jig rten snyan mnan nas //
T02D1218:4a-14: gtso bo ci phyir stong nyid bzhugs //
T02D1218:4a-15: khyod mi bzhugs ni phyogs rmongs pas //
T02D1218:4a-16: gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1218:4a-17: bdag gis khyed kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1218:4a-18: sgyu 'phrul lta bur khyed bzhengs cig /'gro gtso sme ma bdag lags zhes//
T02D1218:4a-19: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / de kho
T02D1218:4a-20: na nyid kyi glu 'dis gnyid bsangs pa dang 'dra
T02D1218:4a-21: bar bcom ldan 'das zla ba zhu ba lta bu'i
T02D1218:4a-22: bdud rtsi'i gzugs las bzhengs te /
T02D1218:4a-23: de'i steng du sa bon gnyis las byung ba'i mtshan
T02D1218:4a-24: ma gnyis kyi steng du yang h'u% dang aam gyi
T02D1218:4a-25: sa bon gnyis kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1218:4a-26: de dag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad gcig tu yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1218:4a-27: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su h'u% yig las
T02D1218:4a-28: byung ba aam yig las yang dag par byung ba'i
T02D1218:4a-29: bdag med ma dang yang dag par ldan pa'i bcom
T02D1218:4a-30: ldan 'das dpal dgyes mdzad rdo rje bdag nyid sprul
T02D1218:4a-31: par bya ste / sku mdog sngon po cher drag
T02D1218:4a-32: pa spyan gsum pa dbu skra kham pa gyen du
T02D1218:4a-33: 'bar ba dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa
T02D1218:4a-34: par bya ste / / dpral ba'i steng du thod pa lnga'i phreng bas brgyan pa //
T02D1218:4a-35: smin ma gnyer ma'i khro gnyer can gyi zhal dang po sngon po /
T02D1218:4a-38: yang g-yon gyi zhal gnyis sngo ba /
T02D1218:4a-39: de bzhin du g-yas kyi zhal gnyis sngo ba /
T02D1218:4a-40: steng gi zhal du ba'i mdog can rnam par gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1218:4a-41: zhal de dag thams cad mche ba gtsigs shing spyan gsum pa'o //
T02D1218:4a-42: g-yas pa'i phyag brgyad na padma'i snod brgyad la gnas
T02D1218:4a-43: pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du glang po
T02D1218:4b-7: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i phyag brgyad na ni sa'i lha mo dang /
T02D1218:4b-15: sku la mgo bo rlon pa'i phreng bas brgyan ba /
T02D1218:4b-16: phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa gcer bu zhabs g-yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1218:4b-17: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la phung po dang /
T02D1218:4b-20: lha'i bu'i bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'i gar gyis rol pas bzhugs par bsgom mo //
T02D1218:4b-21: bdag med ma ni sngon mo phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod par ldan pa ste /
T02D1218:4b-22: phyag g-yas pa dang gzhan gyis lhan cig mnyam par
T02D1218:4b-23: 'khyud pa gcer bu phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa
T02D1218:4b-24: spyan gsum pa thod pa'i phreng bas mgo bor brgyan
T02D1218:4b-25: pa / sku la skyes pa'i mgo bo'i phreng ba skam pos brgyan pa /
T02D1218:4b-26: g-yon brkyang ba bcom ldan 'das dang mnyam par ldan
T02D1218:4b-27: pas mchog tu bde ba'i rol chags pa'i bcom ldan
T02D1218:4b-29: rig pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ji lta ba de bzhin du yang blta ste /
T02D1218:4b-30: rang gi 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha' thams cad yongs su khyab pa bsgom mo //
T02D1218:4b-31: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rang gi sa bon las 'od zer 'phros te /
T02D1218:4b-32: 'od zer des khams gsum thams cad du khyab nas slar yi ge de nyid du gzhug go //
T02D1218:4b-33: yang nam mkha'i ngos su yongs su 'phros nas ye
T02D1218:4b-34: shes kyi 'khor lo mngon sum du spyan drangs te
T02D1218:4b-36: yang dag par mchod cing bstod nas /
T02D1218:4b-37: rang gi dam tshig gi 'khor lo la gzhug par bya ste /
T02D1218:4b-38: zhugs nas lha dang gcig tu gyur pa'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1218:4b-39: de nas rang gi sku'i 'od zer gyi tshogs las
T02D1218:4b-40: byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems
T02D1218:4b-41: dpa' dang / rig pa'i lha mo dang /
T02D1218:4b-42: khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la mchod
T02D1218:4b-43: pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par gyis yang dag par
T02D1218:4b-44: mchod de / de dag gis bdud rtsi lngas yongs
T02D1218:4b-45: su gang ba'i bum pas bdag la dbang bskur ba
T02D1218:4b-46: mchod de / bsgom par bya'o // 'di ltar rim
T02D1218:4b-47: pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa du ma
T02D1218:4b-48: dang rnam par smin pa dang /
T02D1218:5a-0: @5a * // rnam pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skad cig ma bzhi po dag las dga' ba dang /
T02D1218:5a-3: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mngon du 'gyur ro //
T02D1218:5a-7: 'khrig pa bzhi rnam par dag pa las slob dpon dang /
T02D1218:5a-10: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba chen po'i dbang bzhi blang bar bya'o //
T02D1218:5a-11: dbang bskur bas rang gi rigs kyi gtso bos mgo bor mtshan pa ste /
T02D1218:5a-12: 'di ltar sems kyi gtso bo dang /
T02D1218:5a-15: 'od dpag tu med pa rnams kyis dkar mo la sogs pa la gdab par bya'o //
T02D1218:5a-19: 'dod chags rnams kyis ni sbos mo la sogs pa'i spyi bor mtshan par bya'o //
T02D1218:5a-20: de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor lo dang lhan cig ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1218:5a-21: de la a'a li yongs su gyur pa'i zla ba ni me long lta bu'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1218:5a-22: k'a li yongs su gyur pa'i nyi ma ni mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1218:5a-23: de dag gi dbus su gyur pa'i sa bon dang mtshan ma ni so sor kun du rtog pa'o //
T02D1218:5a-24: thams cad gcig tu yongs su gyur pa ni bya ba grub pa'o //
T02D1218:5a-25: gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te /
T02D1218:5a-26: de ltar khams gsum thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par mos par bya'o //
T02D1218:5a-27: 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang lhan cig mchog tu
T02D1218:5a-28: dga' ba'i bde pa chen po ro gcig pa'i byang
T02D1218:5a-29: chub sems phyung ba las yang dag par byung ba
T02D1218:5a-31: dkar mo la sogs pa'i lha mo brgyad rang gi
T02D1218:5a-32: sku'i zhal brgyad du rim pa bzhin du zhugs par
T02D1218:5a-33: bsam par bya'o // de ltar khams gsum thams cad
T02D1218:5a-34: thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin gcig gi tshul
T02D1218:5a-35: bsam par bya'o // du byas pa / rang gi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas btab ste /
T02D1218:5a-36: mgo bor ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la padma 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i padma'o //
T02D1218:5a-37: de'i lte ba la ha% dkar po 'od zer dkar po snang ba dang ldan par blta'o //
T02D1218:5a-38: mgrin par ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma bcu drug pa'i padma'o //
T02D1218:5a-39: de'i dbus su aom dmar po'o //
T02D1218:5a-40: snying gar ni chos kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad pa'i padma'o //
T02D1218:5a-41: de'i dbus su ni h'um sngon po'o //
T02D1218:5b-0: @5b lte bar ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'i padma'o //
T02D1218:5b-1: de'i snying po la aa 'od zer lnga'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:5b-2: 'khor lo de dag yang dag par bsgoms nas de'i
T02D1218:5b-3: 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis nam mkha' la spro zhing
T02D1218:5b-4: bsdus te de nyid du thim par bya'o //
T02D1218:5b-5: de nas rang gi lus la gnas pa'i phyag rgya
T02D1218:5b-6: drug gi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T02D1218:5b-7: go cha bcing bar bya ste /
T02D1218:5b-8: 'khor lo gzugs ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D1218:5b-9: rna cha 'od dpag med pa'i bdag / mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen gtso //
T02D1218:5b-10: lag rgyan rnam par snang mdzad gnas //
T02D1218:5b-11: ska rags la ni don grub bzhugs //
T02D1218:5b-12: yan lag kun spyod rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1218:5b-14: mig gnyis gti mug rdo rje ma //
T02D1218:5b-15: snyan la zhe sdang rdo rje ma //
T02D1218:5b-16: sna la ser sna rdo rje ma //
T02D1218:5b-17: kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1218:5b-18: reg ni phrag dog rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1218:5b-19: yid ni bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1218:5b-20: de dag ni dam tshig tu gyur pa'o //
T02D1218:5b-21: de nas cho ga sna tshogs pa'i sngags bzlas pa ni sngags kyi yi ge'i tshogs brjod pas /
T02D1218:5b-22: de dag lha mo'i zhal nas phyung ste 'od zer
T02D1218:5b-23: dang bcas pa rang gi zhal du zhugs nas rdo
T02D1218:5b-25: rang gi lha mo'i padmar dbab po //
T02D1218:5b-26: de yang lha mo'i zhal nas bdag gi zhal du ste /
T02D1218:5b-27: rim pa du mar rgyun mi 'chad par sngags kyis 'khor bar bya'o //
T02D1218:5b-28: las kyi bye brag las ni kha dog gi bye brag tu byas te /
T02D1218:5b-29: de ltar mi skyo'i bar du sngags yongs su bzla'o //
T02D1218:5b-30: de nas rang gi snying gar nyi ma dang zla
T02D1218:5b-31: ba'i bar du sngon po'i rnam par spro ba dang
T02D1218:5b-33: bdag med ma'i snying gar yang zla ba la aam blta ste /
T02D1218:5b-34: aa% dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag lhan cig
T02D1218:5b-35: tu zhu ba dang ldan pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1218:5b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs par rnam par
T02D1218:5b-37: bsam mo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
T02D1218:5b-38: ka na gnas pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus
T02D1218:5b-39: kyi h'u% las 'phros pa'i a'a li k'a li'i 'od
T02D1218:5b-40: zer gyi tshogs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa'i dbugs kyis
T02D1218:5b-41: spro ba dang bsdu bas rang gi de nyid du
T02D1218:5b-42: zhugs nas gcig tu gyur te /
T02D1218:5b-43: zla ba dang nyi ma kha sbyor ba'i nang sa bon gyi lus kyis gnas pa de'i tshe /
T02D1218:5b-45: thog ma tha ma med pa yi //
T02D1218:5b-47: gzhan min bdag nyid ma yin pa /
T02D1218:5b-48: 'di ni mchog tu bde chen yin //
T02D1218:6a-1: du sa bon yi ge zla ba dang nyi ma
T02D1218:6a-2: dang 'dres par gyur pa'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D1218:6a-3: 'od kyi gong bu'i rnam pa dang mar me'i rtse
T02D1218:6a-4: mo lta bu'i rim pa bzhin du mchod pa dang
T02D1218:6a-5: gtor ma'i yo byad sngon du 'gro bas bsgom par
T02D1218:6a-6: bya'o // aom ainda dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'u
T02D1218:6a-7: ta bahni b'a au r'akkha tsanda sudzdza m'a da p'appa
T02D1218:6a-10: ai dam ba li bhunydza dzi gham phulla dh'uppa m'am
T02D1218:6a-11: sa pim ga aam ba sappa kadzdza sa d'a khanti
T02D1218:6a-13: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /
T02D1218:6a-14: a'a dya nutpanna tvata aom a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6a-15: 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags so //
T02D1218:6a-17: pim gordha ke sha wartma ne /
T02D1218:6a-18: tsa turbim sha ti ne tr'a ya /
T02D1218:6a-19: sho da sha bhu dz'a ya /
T02D1218:6a-20: krishna dz'i m'u ta wa pu she /
T02D1218:6a-21: ka p'a la m'a l'a ne k'a dh'a ri ne /
T02D1218:6a-22: a'adhma ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya /
T02D1218:6a-24: aom m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D1218:6a-25: k'a ra ya k'a ra ya /
T02D1218:6a-28: sho sha ya sho sha ya /
T02D1218:6a-31: n'a ga aashta k'a na grihna grihna sarbba sha tr'um na /
T02D1218:6a-32: ha h'a hi h'i hu h'u he hee ho hoo ham ha:/
T02D1218:6a-34: bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so //
T02D1218:6a-35: aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6a-37: aom badzra karta ri he badzr'a ya h'u% h'u% h'u% phat /
T02D1218:6a-39: aom aa ka tsa ta ta ba ya sha sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6a-40: grong khyer bskyod pa'i sngags so //
T02D1218:6a-41: mchod pa dang gtor ma bya ba'i cho ga'i dus
T02D1218:6a-42: su dang po dang tha mar dam tshig pa'i mchog
T02D1218:6a-43: gi glu brjod par bya ste /
T02D1218:6a-44: kolla ai re tthi aa po l'a /
T02D1218:6a-46: gha ne kri pi ta ho b'adzdza ai /
T02D1218:6a-47: ka ru ne ki ya bi na ro l'a /
T02D1218:6a-48: ta him ba la kh'adzdza yi /
T02D1218:6a-49: g'a dhemma aa n'a bidzdza yi /
T02D1218:6a-50: he le k'a linydza ra pa ni ya yi /
T02D1218:6a-52: tsa hu sa m'a ka tthu r'i sitl'a /
T02D1218:6a-53: kappu ra l'a y'i aa ai /
T02D1218:6a-54: m'a la aindha na s'a lim dza /
T02D1218:6a-55: ta him bha ru kh'a hi aa ai /
T02D1218:6a-56: phrem kha na khe ta ka rente /
T02D1218:6a-57: suddha aa suddha na mu ni aa ai /
T02D1218:6a-58: ni r'am su aam ge tsa d'a pi aa ai /
T02D1218:6a-59: ta him dza sa r'a wa pa ni aa ai /
T02D1218:6a-60: ma la ya dze kundu ru b'a ta ai /
T02D1218:6a-61: dindi ma ta hinna b'adzdzi ya yi /
T02D1218:6a-62: 'di ltar mtshams su lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D1218:6a-63: tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dus su rdo rje dang dril
T02D1218:6a-64: bu 'dzin pa'i sngags pas dngos grub thams cad nye
T02D1218:6a-65: bar bya ba'i phyir glu 'di shin tu dal bas
T02D1218:6a-66: blang bar bya'o // ji ltar bstan pa'i rim pa de bzhin du /
T02D1218:6a-67: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i nang du bcom ldan 'das
T02D1218:6b-0: @6b zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyag g-yas pa na rdo
T02D1218:6b-1: rje g-yon pa na thod pa dang //
T02D1218:6b-2: kha tv'am ga gcer bu zhabs g-yas pa brkyang bas ro la gnon pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1218:6b-3: de bzhin du phyag bzhi pa ni g-yas na rdo
T02D1218:6b-4: rje g-yon na thod pa lhag ma'i phyag gnyis kyis
T02D1218:6b-5: rang gi rig ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1218:6b-6: de dag ji lta ba bzhin du zhal gsum pa
T02D1218:6b-7: phyag drug pa la ni zhal g-yon pa dmar pa
T02D1218:6b-9: phyag g-yon na rtse gsum pa dang dril bu /
T02D1218:6b-10: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang gri gug /
T02D1218:6b-11: phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis rang gi rig ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1218:6b-12: de'i bcom ldan 'das ma ni gri gug dang thod
T02D1218:6b-13: par lhan cig ldan pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das
T02D1218:6b-15: phyag gnyis pa dang phyag bzhi pa dang phyag drug
T02D1218:6b-16: pa 'di dag kyang mdog sngon po spyan gsum pa
T02D1218:6b-17: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng pa phyag rgya drug
T02D1218:6b-18: dang ldan pa / zhabs g-yas pa brkyang bas ro la gnon par bsam mo //
T02D1218:6b-19: 'on kyang zhal brgyad pa mi sgom pas kyang lha'i
T02D1218:6b-20: 'khor lo rang gi lus la gzhug par bsgom mo
T02D1218:6b-21: // aom tree loky'a kshe pa h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6b-23: aom dzv'a la dzv'a la bhyom h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6b-25: aom ki ti ki ti badzra h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1218:6b-27: cho ga lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1218:6b-28: gzhan yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D1218:6b-29: snying rje'i spyan ni dmar po ste /
T02D1218:6b-30: yan lag sngon po byams pa'i sems //
T02D1218:6b-31: bsdu dngos bzhi ni zhabs bzhir bshad //
T02D1218:6b-32: zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D1218:6b-33: phyag ni stong pa bcu drug ste //
T02D1218:6b-34: rus rgyan phyag rgya rnam pa lnga //
T02D1218:6b-35: khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba ste //
T02D1218:6b-36: sha ni pukka s'i ru bshad //
T02D1218:6b-37: khrag ni ri khrod ma ru brtag / tsanda l'i ni khu ba'i gzugs //
T02D1218:6b-38: sme ma rkang dang tshil bu ste //
T02D1218:6b-39: pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1218:6b-40: rus pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi //
T02D1218:6b-41: de ltar sngags pas mos byas nas /
T02D1218:6b-42: lha yi sbyor bas rab tu rgyu //
T02D1218:6b-43: de nas smon lam gdab par bya //
T02D1218:6b-44: rigs skyes rjes su ma nyams shing /
T02D1218:6b-45: dam tshig can dgyes rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1218:6b-46: snying rje ldan zhing bla ma gus //
T02D1218:6b-47: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / lag na rdo rje dril sgrogs shing //
T02D1218:6b-48: zab mo'i chos ni rab 'don pa //
T02D1218:6b-49: shes rab 'dus pa'i khu ba can //
T02D1218:6b-50: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / cung zad tsam gyi sgrub thabs 'di //
T02D1218:7a-2: blo gros rab dman bdag la ni //
T02D1218:7a-3: de nyid mkhyen rnams bzod par gsol //
T02D1218:7a-4: bla ma'i zhabs kyi padmar gus shing sems can brtse //
T02D1218:7a-5: zla ba'i thigs pa'i rigs rnams rab dga' ba //
T02D1218:7a-6: mngon pa'i nga rgyal dgra las rang rgyal ba'i //
T02D1218:7a-7: lha yi mtshan ma rnyed nas bdag gis bris pa yin //
T02D1218:7a-8: dgyes pa'i rdo rje rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02D1218:7a-9: sgrub pa'i thabs su byas pa yis //
T02D1218:7a-10: bsod nams gang zhig rnyed pa des //
T02D1218:7a-11: 'jig rten rdo rje 'dzin grub shog / dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub thabs //
